HYPODERMATITIS SCLERODERMIFORMIS: NO lymphocytic inflammatory infiltrate OR minimal lymphocytic inflammatory infiltrate in lobule
SCLEREMA NEONATORUM: NO neutrophilic inflammatory infiltrate OR minimal neutrophilic inflammatory infiltrate in lobule
LYMPHOMA: atypical lymphocytic inflammatory infiltrate in lobule
LIPODYSTROPHY: patchy histiocytic inflammatory infiltrate in lobule
LIPOATROPHY: patchy histiocytic inflammatory infiltrate in lobule

MORPHEA: plasma cell inflammatory infiltrate in septa
NECROBIOSIS LIPOIDICA: plasma cell inflammatory infiltrate around venule
LUPUS PROFUNDUS: plasma cell inflammatory infiltrate in lobule
DERMATOMYOSITIS: plasma cell inflammatory infiltrate in lobule
POSTIRRADIATION PSEUDOSCLERODERMATOUS PA: plasma cell inflammatory infiltrate in lobule

NECROBIOSIS LIPOIDICA: histiocytic inflammatory infiltrate in dermis OR histiocytic inflammatory infiltrate in septa
